meanings.sent1: I have many bonsais in my garden.
meanings.sent2: The bonsais on display at the exhibition were breathtaking.
meanings.sent3: My friend joked that my bonsais were like a tiny forest in a pot.
meanings.sent4: The bonsais in the garden whispered secrets to each other in the moonlight.
meanings.sent5: The bonsais swayed gently in the breeze, creating a peaceful atmosphere.

meanings.definition: Bonsais: a small tree or shrub grown in a pot and artificially prevented from reaching its normal size
meanings.sent1: She carefully pruned the bonsais to maintain their miniature size.
meanings.sent2: The bonsais in the shop looked so delicate and beautiful.
meanings.sent3: The bonsais in the office made everyone smile with their tiny leaves.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of bonsais was a miniature forest of tranquility.
meanings.sent5: The bonsais in the courtyard added a touch of nature to the urban setting.
